name: Surviv.io market discord bot
description: A discord bot that can get surviv market data and stats

discord_feedback_user_id.description: The user ID of the discord account that bot DMs will be forwarded to, set to 0 to disable

discord_join_link.description: The text message that will be displayed when someone uses the invite command
discord_join_link.value: The hoster of this bot was too lazy to set this command up

market_enabled.description: If the market command is usable

surviv_app_sid.description: The app-sid cookie of the surviv account

blocked.description: A JSON encoded list of user IDs to block
